author: kwright
msg: More fixes as part of CONNECTORS-235. Use the same logic for all different feed types, and also be consistent about the formation of the version data.  Also, switch the output of the description information to the metadata name 'summary'.

msg: TAP5-1591: Add additional tests for tapestry-json

author: kkolinko
msg: 1. Place a better note that Log4J configuration is not needed if it is only osed by one's webapp.
2. Rearrange Log4J configuration section and document how configure it to be used by a single CATALINA_BASE only.
3. Add "productive usage considerations" subsection to JULI one.

author: tabish
msg: Allows the class to set a field that isn't public but has a setter method.  Fixes the compile warnings as well.
